pullrequest.title: Reduce the amount of data sent to LogRecord

content.raw:
It seems strange to store velocity states in a Pose data structure; I would expect to store the angular velocity as a Vector3 rather than a Quaternion, which requires extra conversion when storing the state data and when writing out to the log.

Probably too big of a change.
content.html:
It seems strange to store velocity states in a Pose data structure; I would expect to store the angular velocity as a Vector3 rather than a Quaternion, which requires extra conversion when storing the state data and when writing out to the log.

Probably too big of a change.
